message.name: ERR_DUEDATE_FV_BEFORE_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The due date must be later than the current date.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_MUST_NOT_BE_CANCELLED_OR_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: You may not modify the due date of this verification as the evidence associated with it is no longer in use.

message.name: ERR_DUEDATE_FV_MAY_NOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The due date may not be modified.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_ASSOCIATED_XRV_VERIFICATION_MUST_NOT_BE_CANCELLED_OR_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: You cannot modify the due date as the evidence associated with it is no longer in use.
